request_pathways.name: Patient Request for Own Medical Records (form-1)
Callahan Eye Hospital Patient Access form (form-2)
Fax submission to HIM Release of Information Office
Mail to UAB Health Information Management, 1201 11th Ave. South, Birmingham, AL 35205

forms.document_type: Patient access / authorization form (Callahan Eye Hospital)
Third-party authorization for release of information

access_pathway.primary_pathway_description: Dedicated fillable PDF form for patient self-access, downloaded from a medical records page that clearly separates patient access from third-party release, submitted by fax or mail.

red_flags: Contradictory sensitive records language: page 1 opt-in checkbox conflicts with page 2 blanket authorization inclusion
bright_spots: Dedicated patient self-access form with explicit rights-affirming opening statement
Five-tier graduated record package system giving patients granular control over scope
Descriptive URL and filename make the form immediately identifiable in search results
Clear website separation of patient access vs. third-party release pathways
Multiple electronic delivery options (email, CD, fax) with encryption notice

findability.rationale: Level 5: Prominently available with minimal effort — web search immediately returned direct PDF links, descriptive URL/filename, and the medical records page clearly routes patients to the correct form.

technical_accessibility.rationale: Level 4: Mostly digital with one gap — form-1 has 51 fillable interactive fields for digital completion, but submission requires fax or mail rather than online portal submission.

content_design.rationale: Level 4: Well-organized with minor clarity issues — clear section headers, logical flow, plain language, and tiered record packages, but contradictory sensitive records language and no fee/turnaround information create minor gaps.

patient_centeredness.rationale: Level 5: Process designed around patient self-access as a first-class use case — dedicated form with rights-affirming language clearly distinct from third-party release, granular record selection, and multiple delivery options.

compliance.rationale: Level 4: Minor ambiguities but nothing materially impeding — no notarization, no in-person requirement, proper personal representative accommodation, but fee disclosure is absent and sensitive records language is contradictory.

overall.summary: UAB Hospital provides an above-average patient record request experience with a dedicated self-access form, fillable fields, granular record selection, and clear website organization, held back from top marks by absent fee disclosure and fax-only submission.
